chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13
Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey Lee Larson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jeffrey Lee Larson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jeffrey Lee Larson was found guilty of Incest with Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.06(1).
  • Jeffrey Lee Larson was found guilty of Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault), a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

twenty (20) years IC, fifteen (15) years ES

Concurrent with: each count concurrent

superMiscConds.notes: fined $100 plus costs including DNA surcharge, wage assignment, 120 dtp from date of release or com warrant, pay at the Clerk of Courts

sex offender evaluation and follwo through  
register as sex offender
No contact with victim or minors
